00011         {
00012                 print "<FIELDSET class='rfield'><LEGEND>Resource Selection:</LEGEND>" . LF;

00016           "<INPUT type='radio' name='add_res_type' value='obs'";

00019           " <LABEL for='sel_obs'><B>Observatory</B></LABEL></TD>" . LF;

00029                 print "<H3 align='center'>Please select a resource type</H3>" . LF;

00031         print "<INPUT type='hidden' name='page' value='" . $page . "'>" . LF ;
00032         print "<INPUT type='hidden' name='action' value='" . $action . "'>" . LF ;

00035         static function check($page, $action = NULL , $resource_type = NULL, $resource_id = NULL)
00036         {
00037                 $userid = $_SESSION["user_id"];
00038         $userlevel = $_SESSION["user_level"];
00039 
00043         $link = new DbConnector();
00044 
00045         $query = "SELECT level FROM pages_list WHERE " .
00046              "name='" . $page . ".php" . "' LIMIT 1";
00047         $result = $link->query($query);
00048 
00049 
00050         if ((mysqli_num_rows($result) == FALSE) ||
00051                 (mysqli_num_rows($result) == 0))
00052         {
00053                 print "Page not found!" . LF;

00239         
00240         static function write_stats($link, $page)
00241         {
00242         $userid = $_SESSION["user_id"];
00243 
00244         $query = "INSERT INTO users_statistics SELECT NULL, " .
00245              $userid . ", id, NOW() FROM pages_list WHERE name='" .
00246              $page . "' LIMIT 1";
00247 
00248         $link->query($query);
00249   }
